titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning the cœlestial body of a Christian, after the resurrection preached before the King and Queen at White-Hall April 8, 1694, being Easter-day / by ... Thomas Lord Bishop of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon on Easter-day, before the King and Queen.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
